src_original: sa ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vartate,
parāṃś ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayaty evaṃ pañcasu śikṣāpadeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge
samanvāgata upoṣadhe. ātmanā ca dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate parāṃś ca dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpayati,
ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihāre samādāpayati,
ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ karuṇāvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitaṃ karuṇāvihāre samādāpayati,
